summary:
Need to feel the breeze? Work on that tan but protect the \'preciouses?\' Sling on the new armored bikini. Developed for Favored Soul & Sundracon bodies.
-Male Only-
descriptionHtml:
[font=impact][color=pink][size=28]The Armored Bikini[/size][/color][/font]

Perhaps should be more aptly designated a g-string...here you can enjoy being naked while not being naked! What began as a request evolved into some extra fun with additional meshes. Did the ancient dwemer have oil wrestling? Steamy saunas? Who\'s to know, but there are definitely areas these could have been developed for. Sorry fellahs, thought you might find some new skimpy goodness to put on your lady chars? I am afraid you stepped through the wrong door ;)

Screenshots always encouraged ^^

*Three craftable versions for both FS & Sundracon bodies: Dwarven | Dragon Bone | Ebony. Corresponding craft skill perks not required to create. Sundracon versions denoted with a \'S\' on the name.

[color=orange]<><> Can be found at the forge under \'Dwarven\', \'Ebony\' & \'Dragon\' <><>[/color]

**This mod is integrated with the Favored Soul and Sundracon bodies, if you have a different body installed the mesh will force your body into the mod\'s mold. 

[color=grey]CREDITS:
Chris57, Sundracon & Favored Soul\'s male body meshes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Chars in screenshot are variants of Urshi\'s companion mod Hot BBLS Guys
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20418   and Seedye\'s npc portrayed here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31436

Hair is from ApachiiSkyHair (also included in the Hot Male Housecarls mod)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Body sweat texture is from Titomead\'s Sporty Sexy Sweat - Male
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32851[/color]
author: Av1dPup1l
